terminology.title: Terminology Recommendation
terminology.empty: No terminology available. Please click the file or button to load.
terminology.inputPlaceholder: Paste the ontology structure text here (e.g., copied from Hierarchy)

rec.input_placeholder: e.g., I want to enjoy flowers and food in Beijing during spring.
rec.prompt_placeholder: e.g., Extract location, time, activity, restaurant, and return structured JSON

ontology.confirmDeleteClass: Are you sure you want to delete class "{{className}}"?

knowledge.overview_intro: Here you can explore how <1>structured knowledge shapes</1>, and understand how the <3>recommendation pipeline</3> operates based on <5>dynamic knowledge updates</5>.
knowledge.visualization_intro: Intuitive views of the knowledge structure.
knowledge.visualization_ontology: Ontology Graph: Visualizes core concepts and their defined relationships.
knowledge.visualization_hierarchy: Hierarchy Structure: Displays multi-level entity classifications and dependencies.
knowledge.visualization_kg: KG Visualization: Enables interactive exploration of the full knowledge graph.
knowledge.graphs_update: Terminology & Ontology Update: Incorporates new concepts, updating the ontology.
knowledge.graphs_construction: KG Construction: Extracts entities and relationships from new data, ensuring the graph stays current with new ontology structure.
knowledge.graphs_processing: Processing: Process data to improve graph quality and consistency.
knowledge.recommendation_intro: The <1>Recommendation Pipeline</1> transforms knowledge graphs into real-time, personalized suggestions.

SUS_INTRO: Based on your experience, please rate each item from 1 to 5
SUS_THANKS: ‚úÖ Thank you! Your response has been recorded.
SUS_QUESTIONS: I think that I would like to use this system frequently.
I found the system unnecessarily complex.
I thought the system was easy to use.
I think that I would need the support of a technical person to use this system.
I found the various functions in this system were well integrated.
I thought there was too much inconsistency in this system.
I would imagine that most people would learn to use this system very quickly.
I found the system very cumbersome to use.
I felt very confident using the system.
I needed to learn a lot of things before I could get going with this system.
